description: These herb crusted cutlets with a refreshing side salad evoke the flavours of the Mediterranean.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Oregano Lamb Cutlets with Feta, Rocket & Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the rack of lamb into cutlets. Season with oregano, salt, pepper and sliced onions. allow to infuse for 20 minutes.
Pan fry the cutlets on a hot, non-stick pan for 3 minutes on each side. Allow to rest for 3 minutes. Mix the rocket, oil, tomato and feta together and serve on the side.
